column5: What can I say? First of all Pete is a rwal class act! What a super nice guy and hell of a fisherman, unfortunately the fish could have cooperated a bit more but we still managed 9 fish and had a mixed bag of weather so a succesful day and made a new friend, helped a charity and put 9 in the boat!!! Massive day thanks Pete!!!!
Just as I suspected another happy friend of Pete. Thanks again Pete for your generous donation of your time and thanks to Shloim for supporting Tyler.   Art
I heard a few nice ones were landed, and for a great cause....Cheers to both of you.  Dave
9 in the boat great to hear you had a wonderful day!

Thanks again Sheldon for your generous bid. The fishing wasn't crazy but we did manage 9 and you and Mike put a few nice ones in the boat, 17 3/4 and 15 being the best 2. The evening bite was pretty solid from 7-10pm - the boys in our second boat landed 6 fish in a row all over 15lbs at one point. My brother in my boat managed a PB also at 18. I'll post the pics here today or tomorrow. Cheers!  Pete
well done guys, and kudos to Mr. Pete...,literally one of the nicest fellas ive met in my entire life!
Awesome.  Pete is a class act for sure!!!
Hey Pete, with all these fans you could easily become mayor of Dunnville! Then you get to live in that house!!!!
Aw shucks, thanks guys and gals. Just glad to help out.  Sheldon - L M A O I'll pass... As rustic as it was...!  Pete
